# Testing TSSB class

Initiating a `Node` object 
```{r}
library(bitphyloR)
n0 <- Node$new()
```

```{r}
tssb <- TSSB$new(n0, data = matrix(rnorm(50),50,1), dpAlpha = 1, dpGamma = 1,
                 dpLambda = 1)
```

```{r}
res <- tssb$GetMixture()
barplot(res$weight)
```


```{r}
res2 <- tssb$ConvertTssbToIgraph()
g <- res2$g
plot(g, layout = )
```

```{r}
tssb$CullTree()
res3 <- tssb$ConvertTssbToIgraph()
g <- res3$g
plot(g)

```
